review: I was highly impressed with the CTA Digital PS Vita Hand Grip. It’s lightweight and comfortable, making long gaming sessions much more enjoyable without causing hand fatigue. The grip fits snugly and securely around the Vita, providing full access to all controls and the rear touchpad. The smooth rubberized coating adds a nice touch, enhancing the overall grip. The only minor drawback is that it blocks the charging port, but this is a small price to pay for the significant improvement in comfort and playability. Highly recommended for any Vita owner looking to enhance their gaming experience.
